name: Polylang Auto translation
author: El Khalifa Karim

sections.description: Add a meta box to make automatic translation of the article and page content using free webservices.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload polylang-auto-translation directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: You will found some notice on http://moutons.ch in a few times.
sections.changelog:
= 0.2.1
* Correcting some few bugs which break the myMemory translation service

0.2

  • Now you can choose between Google Translation and myMemory translate services
  • Refactoring the javascript calls.
  • Improve the translation algorithm.
  • Show informations about the translation processus
  • Now you can auto – translate the Strings in the Polylang panel
  • Added auto-translation of Medias Panel.

0.1

  • Plug with polylang 0.9.4

short_description: Add auto-translation functionnality to the Polylang plugin.
description: Add a meta box to make automatic translation of the article and page content using free webservices.

upgrade_notice.0.2: This version fixes the translation timeout problems from myMemory than can happend

screenshots.caption: The Polylang Auto-translation Meta Box in WordPress 3.5
The Polylang Auto-Translation Plugin in the Strings Translation panel of Polylang.
